message:
Not on a computer right now but `const_end` is a `sf` object and it should contain the name on a variable named `name`. You can try then adding this layer when creating the plot:

```r

geom_sf_label(data = const_end, aes(label = name), color = "white") 

```
message_html:
Not on a computer right now but const_end is a sf object and it should contain the name on a variable named name. You can try then adding this layer when creating the plot:
